stories.Title: JUICE mission just launched!
stories.Description: ESA's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer mission, which will explore three of Jupiter's largest moons in 2031, has finally launched today after delays caused by bad weather.
stories.Tweet: JUICE mission just launched! 📦 ESA's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer mission, which will explore three of Jupiter's largest moons in 2031, has finally launched today after delays caused by bad weather. #JUICE https://edition.cnn.com/2023/04/14/world/esa-juice-mission-launch-scn/index.html

stories.Title: SpaceX approaches its seventh rideshare mission
stories.Description: The Falcon 9 rocket is ready to launch on April 15th with over 50 payloads, after unfavorable weather delayed the launch.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX approaches its seventh rideshare mission 📦 The Falcon 9 rocket is ready to launch on April 15th with over 50 payloads, after unfavorable weather delayed the launch. #spaceX https://gizmodo.com/watch-spacex-launch-small-satellites-transporter-7-1850324483

stories.Title: Tesla’s Model 3 gets a refresh
stories.Description: Users on Reddit are currently buzzing about a leaked photo that suggests a possible update to Tesla's Model 3, with the sedan finally receiving its long-awaited redesign.
stories.Tweet: Tesla’s Model 3 gets a refresh 📦 Users on Reddit are currently buzzing about a leaked photo that suggests a possible update to Tesla's Model 3, with the sedan finally receiving its long-awaited redesign. #model3 https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/13/internet-abuzz-over-suspected-redesigned-tesla-model-3/

stories.Title: Apple's future wearables
stories.Description: Insiders claim that the upcoming AR/VR headset could work independently without an iPhone or iPad, and it might be unveiled at this year's Worldwide Developers Conference.
stories.Tweet: Apple's future wearables 📦 Insiders claim that the upcoming AR/VR headset could work independently without an iPhone or iPad, and it might be unveiled at this year's Worldwide Developers Conference. #wearables https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290334/20230413/apple-glasses-hit-shelves-early-2026-2027-per-kuo.htm

stories.Title: FAIR team at Meta AI announces Animated Drawings
stories.Description: As a result of this revolutionary open-source initiative, animating your drawings is now easier and more accessible than ever before.
stories.Tweet: FAIR team at Meta AI announces Animated Drawings 📦 As a result of this revolutionary open-source initiative, animating your drawings is now easier and more accessible than ever before. #FAIR https://github.com/facebookresearch/AnimatedDrawings

stories.Title: A startup founded by three brothers has big space ambitions
stories.Description: Argo Space Corporation, founded by former SpaceX employees, aims to create a transportation network of reusable spacecraft powered by water harvested from the moon.
stories.Tweet: A startup founded by three brothers has big space ambitions 📦 Argo Space Corporation, founded by former SpaceX employees, aims to create a transportation network of reusable spacecraft powered by water harvested from the moon. #space https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/13/spacex-to-build-spacecraft-powered-by-moon-water/

stories.Title: Stability AI releases Stable Diffusion XL
stories.Description: With the launch of this new text-to-image AI system,  the startup seeks to enhance the "richness" of image generation and improve upon its previous model.
stories.Tweet: Stability AI releases Stable Diffusion XL 📦 With the launch of this new text-to-image AI system,  the startup seeks to enhance the "richness" of image generation and improve upon its previous model. #stabilityAI https://venturebeat.com/ai/stability-ai-announces-stable-diffusion-xl-beta-for-api-and-dreamstudio/

stories.Title: Microsoft’s Bing chatbot is now available on iOS
stories.Description: By adding the AI-powered chatbot to its SwiftKey keyboard app, Microsoft is aiming to overtake competitors such as Google and Apple in the AI race.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft’s Bing chatbot is now available on iOS 📦 By adding the AI-powered chatbot to its SwiftKey keyboard app, Microsoft is aiming to overtake competitors such as Google and Apple in the AI race. #bing https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/13/23681493/microsoft-bing-ios-integration-swiftkey-ios-android-availability

stories.Title: Adobe's video software will include AI-powered editing tools
stories.Description: The company plans to enhance post-production efficiency for video editors by integrating AI technology into their Premiere Pro and After Effects software.
stories.Tweet: Adobe's video software will include AI-powered editing tools 📦 The company plans to enhance post-production efficiency for video editors by integrating AI technology into their Premiere Pro and After Effects software. #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290376/20230414/adobe-introduces-ai-powered-editing-tools-premiere-pro-after-effects.htm

stories.Title: Museum offers $25,000 reward for meteorite
stories.Description: The first person to retrieve at least one kilogram of a fireball that fell over Maine (US) in April will be rewarded by a geology museum in the state.
stories.Tweet: Museum offers $25,000 reward for meteorite 📦 The first person to retrieve at least one kilogram of a fireball that fell over Maine (US) in April will be rewarded by a geology museum in the state. #meteorite https://gizmodo.com/maine-space-rock-meteorite-nasa-1850334207

stories.Title: Write all you want with 10,000-character tweets
stories.Description: Apparently, in an effort to compete with Substack, Twitter has announced a new feature for Blue subscribers that allows them to post tweets up to 10,000 characters long.
stories.Tweet: Write all you want with 10,000-character tweets 📦 Apparently, in an effort to compete with Substack, Twitter has announced a new feature for Blue subscribers that allows them to post tweets up to 10,000 characters long. #twitter https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/13/twitter-introduces-10000-character-long-tweets-for-blue-subscribers/
